mapper.sql: t.id, t.use_des, t.config_id, t.call_type,c.sys_name, c.app_ip, t.port, t.target_config_id, d.sys_name as target_sys_name, d.app_ip as target_app_ip, t.is_use, t.user_id, t.remarks, t.dr, t.create_user, t.create_date, t.update_user, t.update_date,e.realname as user_name
mapper.select: select from zg_system_relationship t left join (select a.id,a.app_ip,b.sys_name from zg_system_app a left join zg_system b on b.id=a.sys_id) c on c.id=t.config_id left join (select a.id,a.app_ip,b.sys_name from zg_system_app a left join zg_system b on b.id=a.sys_id) d on d.id=t.target_config_id left join sys_user e on e.id=t.user_id where t.id=#{id}
